verbs.description: [ARG1: roosevelt man] [V: dies] [ARGM-LOC: in industrial accident] [ARGM-LOC: in duchesne] co a 40-year - old roosevelt man died tuesday when a piece of equipment fell on him according to the duchesne county sheriff office the sheriff office identified the victim as andrew romero duchesne duchesne co roosevelt
